channel.title: 🏢 School of Applied Mathematics on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Applied Mathematics on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On Divergence Measures for Training GFlowNets
item.description: Researchers enhanced Generative Flow Network training by introducing variance-reducing control variates for divergence-based learning objectives, accelerating convergence and improving accuracy.
